description:
While pretty much all the Fortnite buzz at the moment revolves around Battle Royale's new superhero season, starring Superman and Robin, today also marks the start of Season 4 of Fortnite OG. The original Season 4, which was Fortnite's summer season back in 2018, was a momentous one, as it marked the beginning of Fortnite's ongoing story. More relevant to this particular article, however, is that it added a couple items to Fortnite's loot pool that have become battle royale staples.

Back in that early era, Fortnite didn't usually change the meta much between seasons. The
title: New Weapons And Loot In Fortnite OG Season 4

description:
Hitman: World of Assassination - Signature Edition sees Agent 47 and his penchant for disguises and creative murders arrive on Nintendo's newest console. The Switch 2's Signature Edition is a comprehensive package, featuring the full campaigns for Hitman (2016), Hitman 2 (2018), and Hitman 3 (2021), along with Contracts mode, Escalation, Elusive Target arcades, the relatively new (and excellent) Freelancer mode, Sniper Assassin mode, featured live content, and everything from both the Hitman 2 Expansion Pack and Hitman 3 Deluxe Pack. That includes cosmetics, locations like Haven Island and The Bank, and side missions such as the Seven Deadly Sins and Special Assignments campaigns.

The only content not included are three s
title: Hitman: World Of Assassination - Signature Edition Disappoints on Switch 2

description:
We once again have a full-length battle pass before us in Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 3, after last season's short Star Wars pass, and it's impressive. The stars of the show are the two collaboration skins, Superman and Robin from DC Comics. Robin is actually where the party starts this season, as he's the skin you'll instantly unlock if or when you purchase the pass. Superman is the bonus skin that will become available through quests in July, but there is a way to get him early. More on that later.

As is the norm for a full-season battle pass, it includes eight skins that you can unlock over time, along with a full set of cosmetics for each of them--back blings, pickaxes, gliders, and more. Aside from Superman and Robin, we've got six Fortnite originals. All of them fit with the
title: Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 3 Battle Pass: All Skins And Rewards

description:
Fortnite's Chapter 6 Season 3: Super arrives with a brand-new season featuring superheroes, new map changes, and a Superman movie crossover. Get ready to fight in a battle of heroes vs. villains using superpowers across three new points-of-interest.

In this guide, we'll reveal all the map locations for Chapter 6 Season 3: Super. First, we'll highlight the three new superhero-themed points-of-interest, and then we'll also show you which parts of the Chapter 6 island are coming back.

For more on Fortnite's latest season, here is everything coming to battle royale in Chapter 6 Season 3: Super, including a new superhero ranking system. Here we highlight all the
title: Fortnite Map Changes In Chapter 6 Season 3: Super

description:
Fortnite's Star Wars season is over, Emperor Palpatine has been defeated, and now it's time for something completely different. Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 3: Super is putting DC Comics on the battle pass for the first time since Chapter 2--and, amusingly, that one also had Superman on it. Let's take a closer look at what Chapter 6 Season 3 has in store for us, from the new battle pass, to map changes, to all those new weapons.


Fortnite Battle Pass Chapter 6 Season 3


It's been a very long time since we've had any DC Comics characters on the Fortnite b
title: Everything New In Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 3: Super

description:
Following the spectacular Death Star Sabotage season finale event, Fortnite is offline for maintenance ahead of the launch of Chapter 6 Season 3. The Emperor has been defeated, the Empire has been run off the Fortnite island yet again, and after five short weeks of Star Wars mayhem, it's time for Fortnite to move on to its summer season, which has only just slightly been officially revealed--more on that in a moment.

Star Wars season was an unorthodox one for Epic Games, which had never dropped a season quite like this one before--past mini seasons were throwbacks, rather than full-throated collaboration events, though last year's Remix season blurred that line. But now that it's over, Fortnite is going back to a more standard season for the summer. And we won't have long to wait for it to get started.

Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 3 start time

Every previous time that a Fortnite season ended with a live event o
title: Fortnite Is Down: When Will Fortnite Servers Be Back Up For Chapter 6 Season 3?

description:
Amid news on 007 First Light and MindsEye, IO Interactive also had a lot to say about Hitman: World of Assassination during the first-ever IO Interactive Showcase. But the one that caught my eye most of all is a Hitman co-op mode. IO told me in an interview after the show how its existence is a sign of how the Hitman team is still exploring new ways to expand the game.

"Even the early prototypes [of co-op mode] that we showed a little bit of [on stage], it's just a different experience to play with a friend in that world," Christian Elverdam, CCO of IO Interactive told me. "And I'm sure, if you know the game, you could imagine a gazillion ways [to play differently]. Like, 'You could do this, I could do that!'"

title: Hitman Co-Op Proves World Of Assassination Isn't Slowing Down Soon
